statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1 AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%' AND prescription IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' AND prescriptions NOT LIKE '%insulin%';
DELETE FROM PatientInformation WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Prescriptions WHERE date_prescribed < '2022-01-01' AND dosage = '500mg';
DELETE FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Prescriptions WHERE medicine_name = 'Aspirin');
DELETE FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F');
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM medical_history WHERE DATE_FORMAT(treatment,'%Y-%m')='2022-01');
DELETE FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 1 AND diagnosis = 'Common Cold';
